tunisian knit stitch tks going from right to left place the hook between the next front and back vertical bar and push all the way to the back of the work yo pull up a loop tunisian purl stitch tps move your yarn to the front of your work in front of the needle then going from right to left place the hook under the next vertical bar yo and pull up a loop tunisian simple stitch tss going from
